title: Improve cell death visually
description: When cells die, don't change color, just shrink and fade

title: Allow configuration in code of whether board is a torus or not
Implement blob-like Game of Life with oozing birth and evaporating death
description: Create a version of Conway's game of life in Processing with: 1. Bloblike cells. 2. Oozing birth effect where parent cells contribute to new cells. 3. Evaporating death effect where cells shrink. 4. Variable generation time, starting at 3 seconds.

title: Allow configuration of board size in code
Implement true metaball merging using a GLSL shader
description: Enhance the blob visualization by implementing a GLSL shader to create true metaball merging when cells are close to each other.
